original_title: National Theatre Live: A Midsummer Night's Dream
overview: A feuding fairy King and Queen of the forest cross paths with four runaway lovers and a troupe of actors trying to rehearse a play. As their dispute grows, the magical royal couple meddle with mortal lives leading to love triangles, mistaken identities and transformationsâ€¦ with hilarious, but dark consequences.
tagline: The course of true love never did run smooth.
title: National Theatre Live: A Midsummer Night's Dream
